    • Method Detail

      • showMessages

        public play.mvc.Result showMessages()
        Default for /messages. Displays all messages a user has.
        Returns:
        Renders a list of messages (received and sent) for the logged in user.

      • readMessage

        public play.mvc.Result readMessage()
        Handles post request for /messagesRead. Marks a message as read.
        Returns:
        Set "read" to 1 for a message and returns to /messages.

      • sendMessage

        public play.mvc.Result sendMessage()
        Handles post requests for /messagesSend. Creates new messages with form input.
        Returns:
        Creates a new message and returns to /messages.

      • deleteMessage

        public play.mvc.Result deleteMessage()
        Handles post requests for /messagesDelete. Deletes a message by it's id.
        Returns:
        Deletes a message and returns to /messages.

      • newMessage

        public play.mvc.Result newMessage()
        Default for /message. Shows a form to write a message.
        Returns:
        Renders a form with empty input field to create a new message.

      • newMessageWithData

        public play.mvc.Result newMessageWithData()
        Handles post requests for /message. Shows a form to write a message as an answer.
        Returns:
        Renders a form with default values for Receiver and Title according to a received message.
